changeSet.author: admin
changeSet.sql: ALTER TYPE tree_type_enum RENAME VALUE 'boolean_tree' TO 'BOOLEAN_TREE';
ALTER TYPE tree_type_enum RENAME VALUE 'inf_tree' TO 'UNLIMITED_TREE';
ALTER TYPE tree_type_enum RENAME VALUE 'limited_tree' TO 'LIMITED_TREE';
ALTER TYPE tree_type_enum RENAME VALUE 'periodic_tree' TO 'PERIODIC_TREE';
ALTER TYPE tree_period_enum RENAME VALUE 'day' TO 'DAY';
ALTER TYPE tree_period_enum RENAME VALUE 'week' TO 'WEEK';
ALTER TYPE tree_period_enum RENAME VALUE 'month' TO 'MONTH';
ALTER TYPE tree_period_enum RENAME VALUE 'quarter' TO 'QUARTER';
ALTER TYPE tree_period_enum RENAME VALUE 'year' TO 'YEAR';
ALTER TYPE tree_period_enum RENAME VALUE 'none' TO 'NONE';
